name: Baby Bengal Tiger Cub’s Fun Run in the Forest for Cool Kids and Youngsters
name_original: Baby Bengal Tiger Cub’s Fun Run in the Forest for Cool Kids and Youngsters
description:
Join Tiger Cub Tigs and Rip Rrrroar through the jungle on his biggest adventure yet! Tap, bounce and go wild with Tigs through awesome tropical forests collecting gems and golden coins along the way. Earn paw prints and leap through Tiger Achievements to become the King of Kings in this super fun and addictive Jungle Jump Game.

Get ready to explore 25 levels of crazy fun with Tigs and journey through 5 stunning jungle realms, leap from dizzy spinning wheels, pounce on bongo’s and sneak aboard the waiting hot air balloons to hurry you on your way. If you fancy a real challenge, prowl the Endless Trail and play against the world with in game and online achievements.

Grrreat Features:

- 25 Wicked and Wild Levels through 5 Magical Forests
- Collect Coins and Gems with One Tap Game Play
- Fire through Jungle Drums and ride Hot Air Balloons
- Game Center Leaderboards
- Gain all 10 Achievements to become the King of Kings!
- Connect to Facebook and tell your friends

Find Us Online;

Twitter: @RisingHighApps
Web: www.RisingHigh.net
